extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Registry Access
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that the Registry can only be accessed with administrator privileges to prevent unauthorized modifications.

extracted_playbook.title: Install HOPCS with Security Considerations
extracted_playbook.description: Install HOPCS in a path without spaces and select a user with low privileges in the DCOM settings using dcomcnfg/Identity.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect X-OPC or X-OTS User Program
extracted_playbook.description: Protect the user program with system variables as per Automation Security Manual '3.2.2.2 Access Restrictions'. Implement measures like forcing deactivation, setting read-only in RUN, and reload deactivation.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor for updates as all present products will be fixed. Note that HOPCS is not suitable for present HIMA Products and is not planned to be fixed.
